砸.definition: to smash; to pound; to fail; to muck up; to bungle

砸場子.definition: to create a disruption at an event or venue

砸夯.definition: to pound the earth to make a building foundation

砸碎.definition: to pulverize; to smash to bits

砸錢.definition: to spend big (on sth); to pour a lot of money into sth

砸鍋賣鐵.definition: to be willing to sacrifice everything one has (idiom)
